title: New thesis explores meanings of obedience in and outside the genocide context in Rwanda (University ...
text: ( Source : University of Gothenburg ) News : Oct 09, 2015 The 1994 genocide against the Tutsi in Rwanda involved an important number of perpetrators. This has brought people to wonder why and how such massive participation was possible. Answers
